Name: Sailing Stone
About the game: Sailing Stone 3D roller arcade indie game. Hop and Roll your way. Dodge obstacles across 50 levels as fast as you can. Try to get the best highscore. Become number one on the leaderboard. Infinite fun. Every levels are made by procedural generation. There are 5 types of biomes. Desert, Plain, Forest, Canyon and Snow. 10 levels in each biomes. Find the best ways to exploit the game. You can save and load your game, you have live on the way and the ability to respawn. The difficulty is incremental. You go faster and faster every level and you can't stop until you reach the end of a level.
